Package com.pandora.general.services.calculation.interfaces

Interface LocalDateTimeService

All Known Implementing Classes:
LocalDateTimeServiceImpl
public interface LocalDateTimeService
The LocalDateTimeService interface defines methods for performing operations related to LocalDateTime instances in the context of the Pandora model. It includes methods to calculate the ending LocalDateTime based on the starting time and the specified end time, as well as to generate a list of LocalDateTime instances based on the starting time and the specified number of timesteps.
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Wim Joost van Hoek

  • Method Details

    • calculateTEndAsLocalDateTime

      LocalDateTime calculateTEndAsLocalDateTime(LocalDateTime t0, double tEnd)
      Calculates the ending LocalDateTime based on the starting time t0 and the specified end time tEnd.
      Parameters:
      t0 - The starting time.
      tEnd - The ending time relative to the starting time.
      Returns:
      The calculated ending LocalDateTime.

    • getDateTimeList

      List<LocalDateTime> getDateTimeList(LocalDateTime t0, int numberOfTimesteps)
      Generates a list of LocalDateTime instances based on the starting time t0 and the specified number of timesteps.
      Parameters:
      t0 - The starting time.
      numberOfTimesteps - The number of timesteps to generate.
      Returns:
      A list of generated LocalDateTime instances.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the configured timestep unit is unsupported.
